name: SCB Platformer Tutorial
description:
This is a platformer I developed through the "Make a Platform Game!" Course  by Benjamin Anderson (https://learn.heartbeast.co/)

The game was developed in GML using GameMaker Studio 2. Right now there are just a handful of levels and a single boss fight, but I've continued to add a few things. I added a health pickup, and expand on levels, enemies, and treasure to be found. 

Art and sound assets were created by Benjamin Anderson; and music came from Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com/) are are used under Creative Commons license. 

Controls:

Keyboard:

Left, Right arrow keys to move, Up to Jump, Down to drop from a ledge. Escape to quit.

Xbox Controller: 

Left joystick to move, A to Jump.  Back button to quit.
